channel.title: Hmm Routers? Moderms?
channel.description:
Ok guys, i made a post about my IP changing everytime i restart my Laptop.
I do not have a router, i have a moderm instead.
Like a router i suppose but heres the difference.
My moderm is topped up with money like a mobile phone. This meens everytime i run out of credits on my moderm i cannot use the internet. It is connected to my laptop VIA USB.
Would i still treat this as a router, and have to portforward using my Model ect because.
Cause, i do not have a username, I somewhat have a password (For logging into my topup site)
When i log in to topup my moderm Heres what i have to do
My moderm came with a SIM card which of course came with a phone number, so for logging in i use a phone number and a password Can my phone number somehow be my username?
Please reply if you get what i meen

@jac wrote:

kk thanks [br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2008, 05:20:53 pm[/size][hr]Didnt work - Gave me a network timeout

item.title: Hmm Routers? Moderms?

item.description:
@nozirev wrote:

to get into your modem go to the internet and type in 192.168.2.1 or whatever.

item.title: Hmm Routers? Moderms?
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Hmm k … Could you help any on how to get in? - I use to have a server on my desktop which i didnt need to go through the process of this…

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm Routers? Moderms?
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

not your email, your IP. and also, every router/modem has a way to get in and change some values around. (one of the requirements of port forwarding)

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm Routers? Moderms?

item.description:
@jac wrote:

I have a no-ip and i have verified my email address -

item.title: Hmm Routers? Moderms?
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

wow thats a weird modem. I would try to no-ip it since you download the ducip or whatever anyways to verify your address.

Read full topic
